text: Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for AAA gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1650. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The fan noise is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the MSI GF Series GF75 THIN 9SC-027 17.3" 60 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 16 GB Memory 512 GB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for AAA gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1650 in the MSI GF Series GF75 THIN 9SC-027 17.3" 60 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 16 GB Memory 512 GB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Starfield and Apex Legends. The build quality of the MSI GF Series GF75 THIN 9SC-027 17.3" 60 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 16 GB Memory 512 GB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the battery life is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!
